explains: n. 清晰易懂；思路清晰；（画面或声音的）清晰，清楚；清澈，明净

sentences.en: It was a model of clarity.
For all its clarity of style, the book is not easy reading.
sentences.cn: 这本书虽然文体清晰，但读起来并不容易。

sentences.en: You might use a yellow filter to improve the clarity of a hazy horizon.
sentences.cn: 你可以用一个黄色滤光器来提高模糊的地平线的清晰度。
